original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2691)@  在武將四周，召喚出4隻<color=#4cc769>飛熊軍</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>飛熊軍</color>屬性  <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1221)@  武力值：$Soldier_Str(1221)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2691)@ Around the generals, 4 <color=#4cc769>Flying Bear Army</color> were summoned to attack nearby enemies. <color=#4cc769>Flying Bear Army</color> Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical Strength: </color>$Soldier_HP(1221)@ Force Value:  $Soldier_Str(1221)@
